text: The feedback is amazing! But everyone wants to see something sexier. Are you okay with that?
I don't know... I mean, I'm having fun reading the comments, but I'm not sure I'm ready for something more revealing.
Come on, it's just a little bit more. Think about it, we could really make it big in this industry.
Okay, I'll trust you. But promise me, we won't go too far.
I promise, we'll take it one step at a time.
To progress further, I have to train Yiny to her next level of corruption.
